import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function Indexnv() { const[data,setData] = useState([]); const loadData = async() =>{ const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/getallnv"); setData(response.data); }; useEffect(()=>{ loadData(); },[]) return (
